name: Balidea
tagline: Always Geared to Innovation and Improvement
description:
BALIDEA is a company in the information technology sector in Spain since 2002. We offer consulting, software development and integration, and technology outsourcing. Our activity is always geared to innovation and continuous improvement, commitment to quality and professionalism in the services offered.
Within the information technology and communication sector, we are known for our young and dynamic, with a highly qualified professional team.

locations.address: Rúa dos Camiños da Vida sn
